mapper.select: SELECT "stats_idx" as statsIdx, "email" as email, "pol_idx" as polIdx, "total_defeated" as totalDefeated, "total_score" as totalScore, "average_score" as averageScore, "max_score" as maxScore, "max_combo" as maxCombo, "first_defeated_at" as firstDefeatedAt, "last_defeated_at" as lastDefeatedAt, "created_at" as createdAt, "updated_at" as updatedAt FROM "user_collection_stats" WHERE "email" = #{email} AND "pol_idx" = #{polIdx}

SELECT "stats_idx" as statsIdx, "email" as email, "pol_idx" as polIdx, "total_defeated" as totalDefeated, "total_score" as totalScore, "average_score" as averageScore, "max_score" as maxScore, "max_combo" as maxCombo, "first_defeated_at" as firstDefeatedAt, "last_defeated_at" as lastDefeatedAt, "created_at" as createdAt, "updated_at" as updatedAt FROM "user_collection_stats" WHERE "email" = #{email} ORDER BY "total_defeated" DESC, "total_score" DESC

SELECT "stats_idx" as statsIdx, "email" as email, "pol_idx" as polIdx, "total_defeated" as totalDefeated, "total_score" as totalScore, "average_score" as averageScore, "max_score" as maxScore, "max_combo" as maxCombo, "first_defeated_at" as firstDefeatedAt, "last_defeated_at" as lastDefeatedAt, "created_at" as createdAt, "updated_at" as updatedAt FROM "user_collection_stats" WHERE "pol_idx" = #{polIdx} ORDER BY "total_defeated" DESC, "total_score" DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE "user_collection_stats" SET "total_defeated" = "total_defeated" + #{defeatedCount}, "total_score" = "total_score" + #{scoreGained}, "average_score" = ("total_score" + #{scoreGained}) / ("total_defeated" + #{defeatedCount}), "max_score" = GREATEST(NVL("max_score", 0), #{scoreGained}), "max_combo" = GREATEST(NVL("max_combo", 0), #{maxCombo}), "last_defeated_at" = SYSDATE, "updated_at" = SYSDATE WHERE "email" = #{email} AND "pol_idx" = #{polIdx}
